title: Ross Barnes images and memorabilia WTB
author: GaryPassamonte

posts.post_title: Ross Barnes images and memorabilia WTB
posts.post_content: This is my annual plea for Barnes items.

Gary:

Did you pick up my 1870 Forest City cabinet w/Barnes from REA last month? The price was certainly right..........
Phil- If you mean the 1869 FC large format image, the answer is no.  The price was a little out of my reach.  Great piece.
